print number increasing pyramid pattern


package design.baseTestComponents;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Arrays;

public class Sep {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
         
		int n=6;
		for(int i =1;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(int j=1;j<=i;j++)
			{
				System.out.print(j+" ");
			}
		System.out.println();
}
	}
}
